attributes.action: Stop any more foreigners entering UK to provide jobs for real british people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if  foriegners were stopped from entering the UK  it would provide enough employment for the real british people who are currently unemployed.We all know people who are british who dont want work but are capable, to which their benefits shouldn't be cut but stopped.We keep letting people into this country for an ever decreasing chance of employment.I have paid into Britain for 28 years and I am treated worse than someone who as just arrived from another country.....WHY ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
